chart_description: This chart displays the number of callbacks per second for various operations on the dictionary data structure. Callbacks occur when a specific event takes place and the corresponding registered function is executed. This chart helps in analyzing the performance of dictionary operations.

dimension_descriptions.conflicts: The number of callbacks per second for dictionary conflicts, i.e., when two or more elements try to acquire the same position in the dictionary.
dimension_descriptions.deletes: The number of callbacks per second for dictionary deletions, i.e., when an element is removed from the dictionary.
dimension_descriptions.inserts: The number of callbacks per second for dictionary insertions, i.e., when a new element is added to the dictionary.
